The closeness of illuminated
Christmas decoration to traffic
signals in business areas often
creates a safety hazard, the Ari-
iona Automobile Association re-
ports.


AAA urged motorists to take
extra caution at intersections,
explaining that it had received
reports of festive lights Inter

ferring' with the effectiveness
OF traffic signals. In some cases,
1t said, Christmas lights are
fastened to signal posts and the
closeness of the decorations to
traffic lights many times is con-
fusing to the driver.


Approach intersections slowly
and take good bead on the
lights, the Arizona Automobile
Association suggests,

WASHINGTON. DC.-Civil rights
groups plan to raise warchest of
ten million dollars to defeat con-
servatives of either ma jor party,
1t was announced here.


Detailing the plan was Rev.
Walter Fauntroy, trusted friend
and aide of Southern Christian
Leadership Conference boss
Martin Luther King, Jr., and
head of the SCLC.


Rev. Fauntroy said the money
raised to reward the friends and
punish the enemies of the civil
rights struggle, would be used on
a nationwide basis, not exclu-
sively in the South.

full articles.headline: Rights versus Riaht
full articles.article:
WASHINGTON. DC.-Civil rights
groups plan to raise warchest of
ten million dollars to defeat con-
servatives of either ma jor party,
1t was announced here.


Detailing the plan was Rev.
Walter Fauntroy, trusted friend
and aide of Southern Christian
Leadership Conference boss
Martin Luther King, Jr., and
head of the SCLC.


Rev. Fauntroy said the money
raised to reward the friends and
punish the enemies of the civil
rights struggle, would be used on
a nationwide basis, not exclu-
sively in the South.
